p: Data are shown as the mean ± SEM. Multiple regression analysis was used to test the differences in the body weight changes in Rag2 −/− γc −/− mice or humanized mice after infection. The differences in cell death, fluorescence intensity, cell percentages, cell numbers and viral titers between the control and treatment groups were analyzed by an unpaired, two-tailed Student’s t-test. The p-value of the difference in survival was determined by the Kaplan-Meier log-rank test. All these analyses were performed with GraphPad Prism software (version 7.0e, GraphPad software, USA), with p-values <0.05 considered significant.
